about_the_game:
Roomination is an adventurous 2 to 4 player party game where chaos, and a bit of cartographic confusion collide! Dive into ancient ruins, hunt for treasure, and try not to fall victim to the countless traps hidden within. Gather your friends, don your explorer hat, and get ready for a multiplayer experience packed with laughter, sabotage, and a few wrong turns along the way!

🎉 Multiplayer Mayhem

Up to 4 players can join in on the action, competing in a fast-paced, race to riches. Whether you're plotting, drawing, or just trying to survive, you'll find plenty of reasons to laugh (and curse) as your friends stumble over their own misguided steps.

🗺️ Chart Your Own Path (Literally!)

In Roomination, every player becomes their own navigator. Using our cartography tool, you’ll sketch out the ruins as you explore. But beware! Your map might not match reality, and watching your friends bungle their way through a poorly drawn path is all part of the fun. Will your map guide you to treasure or lead you right into a trap?

👫 Co-Op Cartography

Team up with other players to collaboratively draw out the ruins with Co-Op Cartography! Work together on a shared map, but remember: two (or more) heads aren't always better than one. Miscommunication or different strategies might result in some "creative" routes that get everyone lost or worse... trapped.

📝 Track Every Move

The Events Log is your secret weapon for staying ahead. It tracks every player's movements through the ruins—what rooms they’ve discovered, where they’ve been, and what dangers they’ve faced. Stay informed about who’s one step ahead and who might be heading straight into trouble. Keep a close eye on the log to outsmart your competition and make sure you're always where you want to be!

🏺 Uncover Powerful Relics

Hidden throughout the ruins are ancient artifacts, each with unique abilities to turn the tide in your favor. Use these treasures wisely to gain an edge, whether you're setting traps, escaping danger, or... making sure a "friend" gets what they deserve.

😼 Cute but Fierce Explorers

Choose from a wide range of adorable animal adventurers, each with their own unique personalities. As you progress, unlock new characters and show off your favorite explorer as you claim victory in the ruins!

🖼️ Share Your Maps!

Once the dust settles and the treasures have been claimed, export and share your maps with friends! Relive the journey, the mistakes, and the madness by sharing your hand-crafted maps for everyone to see—whether they’re masterworks of cartography or hilariously wrong misadventures.

Key Features:

  • 4-Player Party Chaos: Team up or sabotage your friends in a multiplayer treasure hunt filled with laughs.

  • Draw Your Own Maps: Use the cartography tool to chart your progress, but be careful—one wrong line could send you straight into danger.

  • Co-Op Cartography: Work together with your fellow explorers to create a shared map. Will teamwork make the dream work, or will chaos reign?

  • Unlockable Characters: Play as a variety of cute and quirky animal explorers, with new characters to unlock as you play.

  • Powerful Artifacts: Discover ancient items that offer game-changing abilities, but use them wisely!

  • Traps & Surprises: Navigate through treacherous rooms filled with traps and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

  • Event Log: Never lose track of the action with the log system tracking every player's movements and key events.

  • Export & Share Your Maps: After each game, save and share your custom maps with friends to remember the chaos, the traps, and the treasure!

Gather your friends, sharpen your pencils, and prepare for treasure, traps, and total chaos in Roomination—where every map could be your downfall!

name: Roomination
short_description: Explore ancient tombs and ruins in this 4-player, turn-based party game! Master cartography as you map uncharted paths, uncover secrets, and ruminate over your next move. Work together or sabotage one another with a variety of items, and discover hidden treasures and the mysteries of your expedition
